sentences.en: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.cn: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.en: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.cn: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.en: developments in science and technology
sentences.cn: 科学技术的发展

sentences.en: the Museum of Modern Art
sentences.cn: 现代艺术博物馆

sentences.en: The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.
sentences.cn: 这座博物馆藏有大量早期的照片。

phrases.cn: 美术馆，美术博物馆；艺术博物馆

sentences.en: The hotel is opposite the post office.
sentences.cn: 邮局的对过是旅馆。

sentences.en: Men in the post office classify mail according to places it is to go.
sentences.cn: 邮局里的人员将信件按寄送地点分类。

sentences.en: He lit upon some jest books in the bookstore.
sentences.cn: 他在书店偶然发现了一些笑话集。

sentences.en: You can find these books in any local bookstore.
sentences.cn: 你在当地的任一所书店都能找到此类书。

sentences.en: The technology bookstore: Browse for books on these and other technical topics.
sentences.cn: 技术书店：浏览关于这些主题和其他技术主题的图书。

sentences.en: It’s on at the local cinema.
sentences.cn: 此片正在当地影院上映。

sentences.en: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.cn: 他们正在建一家新医院。

sentences.en: Turn left at the first crossing.
sentences.cn: 在第一个十字路口左转。

sentences.en: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.cn: 里基转身走了。

sentences.en: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.cn: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.en: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.cn: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

phrases.cn: 关掉，关闭；拐弯，使转变方向

sentences.en: She held out her left hand.
sentences.cn: 她伸出左手。

sentences.en: a scar on the left side of his face
sentences.cn: 他左脸上的伤疤

sentences.en: He vainly hope to travel round the world on foot.
sentences.cn: 他梦想步行周游世界。

sentences.en: I missed the regular bus, so I had to go to work on foot.
sentences.cn: 早上没赶上班车，没奈何只好步行去上班。

sentences.en: He continues up the mountain on foot, in the snow and sleet, and he's getting sick from the cold.
sentences.cn: 在冰雨的天气里，他继续步行朝着山上前进，因为天气寒冷，他开始变得不舒服了。

sentences.en: The price of oil fell by a further $2 a barrel.
sentences.cn: 每桶油价又下跌了两美元。

sentences.en: I was overcharged by £3.
sentences.cn: 我被多收了3英镑。

sentences.en: Godard’s first film was better by far (=  by a large amount or degree  ) .
sentences.cn: 戈达尔的第一部电影要好得多。

sentences.en: I took a bus to San Francisco.
sentences.cn: 我乘公共汽车去旧金山。

sentences.en: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

sentences.en: It is a big airline with a large fleet of planes.
sentences.cn: 这是一家大航空公司，拥有庞大的机群。

sentences.en: It’s much quicker to go by plane .
sentences.cn: 乘飞机去会快很多。

sentences.en: She slept on the plane .
sentences.cn: 她在飞机上睡着了。

sentences.en: They sent me home in a taxi.
sentences.cn: 他们用出租车把我送回家。

phrases.cn: 乘出租车，搭出租车；打的

sentences.en: the ship’s captain
sentences.cn: 这艘船的船长

sentences.en: a luxury cruise ship
sentences.cn: 一艘豪华游艇

sentences.en: the New York City subway
sentences.cn: 纽约市的地铁

sentences.en: a crowded subway station
sentences.cn: 拥挤的地铁站

sentences.en: Boston has the oldest subway system in the US.
sentences.cn: 波士顿拥有美国最老的地铁运输系统。

sentences.en: We went all the way to Inverness by train.
sentences.cn: 我们一路坐火车到因弗内斯。

sentences.en: The car was travelling at a very slow speed.
sentences.cn: 汽车正以非常慢的速度行驶。

sentences.en: a slow walker
sentences.cn: 慢慢走着的人

sentences.en: The economy faces a year of slower growth.
sentences.cn: 经济将面临增长更缓慢的一年。

phrases.cn: 减速，放慢速度；使……慢下来

sentences.en: Keep your speed down.
sentences.cn: 速度放慢。

sentences.en: House prices have come down in recent months.
sentences.cn: 最近几个月房价降下来了。

sentences.en: Turn the radio down.
sentences.cn: 把收音机的音量调低。

phrases.cn: 下降；平静下来；传下去；被接受

sentences.en: You will need to slow down for a while.
sentences.cn: 你将会需要放松一会儿。

sentences.en: He stopped suddenly when he saw Ruth.
sentences.cn: 他一看到露丝，便突然停住了。

sentences.en: Stop! Come back!
sentences.cn: 停下，回来！

sentences.en: He stopped the car and got out.
sentences.cn: 他把车停住并下了车。

phrases.cn: 住宿；[口]逗留在；对…有所踌躇
顺便访问；中途作短暂访问

sentences.en: It is said that Mrs White rules her husband strictly.
sentences.cn: 据说怀特夫人对她的丈夫管得很严。

sentences.en: He hitched his chair to me and told the secrets about Mrs Johnson.
sentences.cn: 他把椅子向我身边挪了挪，然后把约翰逊夫人的秘密告诉了我。

sentences.en: the early morning sunshine
sentences.cn: 清晨的阳光

sentences.en: an afternoon in early spring
sentences.cn: 一个早春的午后

sentences.en: In the early days, the railways mainly carried goods.
sentences.cn: 最初，铁路主要用于运输货物。

sentences.en: The Sword split the Knight's helmet and bit him fatally.
sentences.cn: 剑劈开了骑士的头盔并致命地刺进他。

sentences.en: Instead, he was told the last time that she loved him, got a hug from her, put his helmet on her so that she can live, and die himself...
sentences.cn: 相反，他叫女孩最后一次说她爱他，最后一次拥抱他，并让她戴上自己的头盔，因而，女孩可以幸免于难，而他自己却离开了人世……

sentences.en: What you definitely need: helmet, appropriate clothing, phone, passport (with visas), water and snacks.
sentences.cn: 必需品：头盔，适量的衣物，电话，护照和签证，水和点心。

sentences.en: All passengers must wear seat belts.
sentences.cn: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.en: It’s getting late. I really must go.
sentences.cn: 天晚了，我真的必须走了。

sentences.en: You must work hard.
sentences.cn: 你必须努力工作。

phrases.cn: 一定（对过去事实肯定的推测）

sentences.en: Susanna was wearing a black silk dress.
sentences.cn: 苏珊娜穿着一条黑色真丝连衣裙。

sentences.en: He wore glasses for reading.
sentences.cn: 他阅读时戴眼镜。

sentences.en: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.cn: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.en: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.cn: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.en: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.cn: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.en: In this materialistic age we do not have time to pay attention to our surroundings.
sentences.cn: 在这唯物主义的时代里，我们没有时间去注意我们周围的世界。

sentences.en: In economic work, we should pay attention to opening up the source and regulating the flow from time to time.
sentences.cn: 在经济工作中， 应该经常注意开源节流。

sentences.en: We should pay attention to this from the very beginning.
sentences.cn: 我们从一开始就要注意这个问题。

sentences.en: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.cn: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.en: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.cn: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

sentences.en: It's so much safer to get across the road at the traffic lights.
sentences.cn: 在有交通红绿灯的地方横穿马路要安全得多。

sentences.en: And then we went to Munich.
sentences.cn: 然后我们去了慕尼黑。

sentences.en: She urgently phones her contact, and he orders her to go to Munich and remain untraceable.
sentences.cn: 她急切地打电话给她的联络人，对方指令她前往慕尼黑，并保持不被他人找到。

phrases.cn: 拜仁慕尼黑（德国足球队）

sentences.en: Germany borders on France.
sentences.cn: 德国与法国接壤。

sentences.en: The news aroused much fear in Germany.
sentences.cn: 这消息在德国引起很大恐慌。

sentences.en: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.cn: 新纳粹主义正在德国的一些地方复活。

phrases.cn: 西德（原德意志联邦共和国的简称）

sentences.en: Like I said, perfect, if you live in Alaska.
sentences.cn: 像我说过的，完美，如果你住在阿拉斯加的话。

sentences.en: Alaska and Hawaii were dependencies of the United States.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加和夏威夷过去是美国的属地。

sentences.en: Once they went camping with friends who had moved to Alaska.
sentences.cn: 有一次，他们和几个搬到阿拉斯加的朋友去野营。

phrases.cn: 阿拉斯加山脉（美国阿拉斯加州南部山脉）

sentences.en: She tumbled over a sled.
sentences.cn: 她被雪橇绊了一跤。

sentences.en: When his sled broke down, he repaired it.
sentences.cn: 当他的雪橇坏掉时，他自己维修。

sentences.en: The hut stands at the foot of a near vertical wall of rock in an icy fjord in the high Arctic, a week away by dog sled from the nearest human settlement.
sentences.cn: 小屋坐落在高纬度北极地区峡湾边一座几乎是垂直的山岩下，从最近的有人居住的地方到此地，狗拉的雪橇要走一个星期。

phrases.cn: 雪橇犬；雪橇狗；拉雪橇的狗

sentences.en: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.cn: 慢点——你开得太快了。

sentences.en: a fast-moving river
sentences.cn: 湍急的河流

sentences.en: Johnny ran off as fast as his legs could carry him (= running as quickly as he could ) .
sentences.cn: 约翰尼飞也似的跑开了。

sentences.en: I left my bag of film on the  ferry.
sentences.cn: 我把装底片的旅行袋遗放在渡船上.

sentences.en: The ferry service of bygone days has been replaced by that tunnel.
sentences.cn: 往日的渡口已被那个隧道取代。

sentences.en: It is windy today,so it would be difficult to put the ferry boat across.
sentences.cn: 今天刮风，要摆渡到对岸不容易。

phrases.cn: 渡轮码头；车船联运港；客轮码头

sentences.en: Papa Westray has a population of just 70 and no secondary school.
sentences.cn: 帕帕韦斯特雷岛人口只有70，岛上没有中学。

sentences.en: He traveled Scotland last year.
sentences.cn: 他去年在苏格兰旅行。

sentences.en: England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。

sentences.en: Why should they not go on to Scotland, if that had been the case?
sentences.cn: 要是真象你所想的那样，那他们干吗不到苏格兰去呢？

phrases.cn: n. 苏格兰场（伦敦警察厅）
（苏格兰正式定为国教的）苏格兰长老会

sentences.en: Eric went to Seattle to visit his cousins.
sentences.cn: 埃里克到西雅图去看望他的表兄弟。

sentences.en: I was really pleased that they came to visit me.
sentences.cn: 他们来看我，我真是高兴。

sentences.en: Which cities did you visit in Spain?
sentences.cn: 你在西班牙去了哪些城市？

phrases.cn: 国事访问（国家元首至其他国的官式访问）

sentences.en: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.cn: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.en: Plan a weekend to go out with friends to barbecue countryside, see a film, play electronic games, play footaball or barly take a walk together.
sentences.cn: 安排个周末跟朋友一起，一起去野外烧烤、看电影、玩电子游戏、踢足球、或者只是一起走走。

sentences.en: You are calling your friend to see if he/she wants to go to see a film.
sentences.cn: 你打电话问你的朋友他/她是否想去看电影。

sentences.en: By the way, would you like to see a film with me tomorrow?A new film is on at the Capital Cinema.
sentences.cn: 顺便问一下，明天你愿不愿意和我一起去看电影? 首都电影院在上演一部新片。

sentences.en: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.cn: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.en: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.cn: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.en: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

phrases.cn: 公务旅行，出差；商务旅行
往返旅行；环程旅行；[牌]大团圆

sentences.en: Fred and Jeff are friends. They want to take a trip together.
sentences.cn: 国庆节快要来临了，弗雷德和杰夫是朋友，他们想一起去旅行。

sentences.en: Because of this, we often feel the need to take a trip somewhere to “get away from it all” as they also say.
sentences.cn: 为此，我们常常感到有必要去什么地方旅行来摆脱这种生活， 但是与其花大把的钱外出乱逛，为什么不稍作停歇？

sentences.en: His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.en: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.cn: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.en: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.cn: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

sentences.en: I do most of my studying in the evening.
sentences.cn: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.en: I’m usually out on Friday evenings.
sentences.cn: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.en: What are you doing tomorrow evening?
sentences.cn: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

sentences.en: I think I’ll go to bed early tonight.
sentences.cn: 我想今晚我会早点上床睡觉。

sentences.en: We’re meeting him at 9 o’clock tonight.
sentences.cn: 我们今晚9点和他见面。

sentences.en: Our class is going to London tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们班明天要去伦敦。

sentences.en: He will speak to us next week.
sentences.cn: 下星期他将给我们做讲演。

sentences.en: I reckon we'll go next week.
sentences.cn: 我想我们将在下星期去。

sentences.en: I have numerous engagements next week.
sentences.cn: 下星期我有许多约会。

sentences.en: a German-English dictionary
sentences.cn: 一本德英词典

phrases.cn: 汉英词典；汉英字典；汉英辞典

sentences.en: a comic novel
sentences.cn: 滑稽小说

phrases.cn: n. 喜剧性穿插；喜剧性调剂

sentences.en: ...comic book heroes such as Spider Man.
sentences.cn: …连环漫画杂志中的男主角，如蜘蛛人。

sentences.en: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.cn: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.en: What does that word mean?
sentences.cn: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.en: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.cn: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.en: Send them a post card.
sentences.cn: 寄给他们一张明信片。

sentences.en: Several years ago I received a post card from a friend in Jackson Hole, Wyo., who wrote, " I am skiing with abandon!"
sentences.cn: 几年前，我收到一个在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔的朋友寄给我的明信片，上面写道：“我正在尽情的滑雪！”

sentences.en: My Christmas present is a post card. There is a lovely panda in it.
sentences.cn: 我的圣诞节礼物是一张明信片，上面有一只可爱的熊猫。

sentences.en: piano lessons
sentences.cn: 钢琴课

sentences.en: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.cn: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.en: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.cn: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

sentences.en: They travelled 200 miles on the first day.
sentences.cn: 他们第一天行进了200英里。

sentences.en: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.cn: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.en: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.cn: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

phrases.cn: 了不起的；而且比这多得多

sentences.en: She balked at the price.
sentences.cn: 她对这价格犹豫不决。

sentences.en: They dickered over the price of apples.
sentences.cn: 他们就苹果的价格讨价还价。

sentences.en: Competition should beat the price down.
sentences.cn: 竞争一定会使价格下跌。

sentences.en: Thus informed, the people rose together on the designated day to overthrow the Yuan, and since that time mooncakes have become an integral part of the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.cn: 后来，人们在八月十五那天集合起来推翻了元朝统治。 从那以后，月饼成为中秋节不可或缺的元素。

sentences.en: We’ve very much enjoyed working together .
sentences.cn: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.en: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.cn: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.en: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.cn: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.en: A whole range of people from all backgrounds can get together and enjoy themselves.
sentences.cn: 出身经历各异的人们可以聚在一起玩得很开心。

sentences.en: Parents make mooncakes, moon masks, and lanterns with their children.
sentences.cn: 家长们与他们的孩子们一起制作月饼、月亮形面具和灯笼。

sentences.en: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.cn: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.en: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.cn: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.en: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.cn: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

sentences.en: the craters on the surface of the moon
sentences.cn: 月球表面的环形山

sentences.en: The Americans landed on the Moon in 1969.
sentences.cn: 美国人于1969年登上月球。

sentences.en: The moon appeared from behind a cloud.
sentences.cn: 月亮从云后钻了出来。

sentences.en: ...a relaxed and happy atmosphere that will allow you to study to your full potential.
sentences.cn: …一个将使你学习到充分发挥潜能的轻松又愉快的氛围。

sentences.en: He studied History and Economics.
sentences.cn: 他学过历史和经济学。

phrases.cn: 社会学科，社会研究；社会课程
商业研究；业务研究；经营研究

sentences.en: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
sentences.cn: 那首诗的含义始终是个谜。

sentences.en: He thought he had solved the puzzle .
sentences.cn: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

phrases.cn: n. 七巧板；智力拼图玩具

sentences.en: We’re going to do some hiking this summer.
sentences.cn: 今年夏天我们要去远足。

sentences.en: Utah is a great place to go hiking .
sentences.cn: 犹他州是徒步旅行的绝好去处。

phrases.cn: 去远足；去徒步旅行；徒步行

sentences.en: She: In my high school French class, there was a pen pal requirement.
sentences.cn: 她 ：在高中的法语课上，要求每个人交一名笔友。

sentences.en: You can also find a pen pal or an online community that will let you ask questions and talk to others who are learning French.
sentences.cn: 你也可以找个笔友，或是在网上找一个能让你问问题和与他人交流法语学习经验的论坛社区。

sentences.en: What are your hobbies?
sentences.cn: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.en: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.cn: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.en: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.cn: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

sentences.en: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.cn: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.en: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.cn: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.en: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.cn: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.en: In Australia, climate change is a political football, kicked about in the power game played in Canberra.
sentences.cn: 在澳大利亚，气候变化是政治足球，在堪培拉的权力游戏中被踢来踢去。

sentences.en: Canberra needs the relationship - and the guarantees of military assistance that go with it - far more than Washington does.
sentences.cn: 堪培拉需要这种关系，以及随之而来的军援保证，远远超过华盛顿对这种关系的需要。

sentences.en: Kylie Catchpole, a research fellow at the Australian National University in Canberra, says the design is promising because it works over a broad band of the spectrum.
sentences.cn: 凯莉·卡崔布尔，堪培拉的澳洲国立大学的一名女研究员，说道这项设计很有前景因为研究的是宽频带的光谱。

sentences.en: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.cn: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.en: an amazing bargain
sentences.cn: 令人惊喜的便宜货

phrases.cn: 奇迹发生之地（NBA季后赛的宣传口号）

sentences.en: Shall I get the keys?
sentences.cn: 我拿钥匙可以吗？

sentences.en: Well, shall we go?
sentences.cn: 那，我们走好吗？

sentences.en: Let's have a nice little stroll, shall we?
sentences.cn: 咱们去好好散散步，好吗？

sentences.en: He dribbled past the fullback and scored a goal.
sentences.cn: 他越过对方后卫，趁势把球踢入球门。

sentences.en: When did you join the Labour Party?
sentences.cn: 你何时加入工党的？

sentences.en: I decided to join the army.
sentences.cn: 我决定去参军。

sentences.en: You can enjoy a sport without joining a club or belonging to a team.
sentences.cn: 不加盟俱乐部或球队也可以享受体育运动的乐趣。

sentences.en: Manchester United Football Club
sentences.cn: 曼联（队）足球俱乐部

sentences.en: We don’t have enough books so you’ll have to share.
sentences.cn: 我们书不够，所以你们得合着用。

sentences.en: The three of us shared a taxi.
sentences.cn: 我们三个人合乘一辆计程车。

sentences.en: a car factory
sentences.cn: 汽车制造厂

sentences.en: factory workers
sentences.cn: 工厂工人

sentences.en: workers in the tourist industry
sentences.cn: 旅游行业工作者

sentences.en: reports from local aid workers
sentences.cn: 来自当地援助人员的报道

sentences.en: That postman is in charge of this route.
sentences.cn: 那个邮递员负责这条投递线路。

sentences.en: Curtis Matthews, a retired postman from North Carolina, was running the bar as a favour to his brother, who had left Louisiana after the attempt on his life the year before.
sentences.cn: 柯蒂斯·马修斯是一名来自南卡罗来纳的邮递员。 在因约翰·马修斯生命受到威胁而离开路易斯安那州以后，他就帮哥哥经营着酒店。

sentences.en: A businessman will grasp at any chance to make a profit.
sentences.cn: 一个商人会抓住任何一个机会赚钱。

sentences.en: His parents are so rich that he can just play at being a businessman.
sentences.cn: 他父母有的是钱，以致他可以敷衍了事地作个商人。

sentences.en: He is a businessman ... and that is what we need right now. Someone who can create jobs for our kids.
sentences.cn: 他是个商人，也就是我们现在最需要的人，他是一个可以为我们的孩子创造就业机会的人。

sentences.en: The police officer said your country [Pakistan] is not secure but I still prefer to live there. I love my country.
sentences.cn: 警官说你们巴基斯坦现在也不安全，但是我仍然希望回到祖国去生活，我爱我的祖国。

sentences.en: The laws specify, for example, that the police officer administering a photo or live lineup should not know who the suspect is, and the witness should be told that the officer does not know.
sentences.cn: 法律详细规定的有，如，警官在处理照片或一列待指认嫌疑人时不能先入为主地知道谁是嫌犯，而目击证人在指证时也应被告知，警察不知道谁是嫌犯。

sentences.en: The police officer led him to a beautiful garden with lots of grass, pretty flowers, and manicured hedges.
sentences.cn: 警官带着他到一个很美的花园，里面有很多的草，很多的花，修剪好的树坪。

sentences.en: In scorn of that audience, he imagines another audience, another audience to write for and to emulate, an audience represented by the fisherman.
sentences.cn: 讽刺这个观众，他想象着另一个观众，可以为之写作，做榜样的观众，渔夫代表了这个观众。

sentences.en: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.cn: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.en: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.cn: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.en: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.cn: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

phrases.cn: 火箭专家；股市分析高手；[喻]行家

sentences.en: an airline pilot
sentences.cn: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.en: a fighter pilot
sentences.cn: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.en: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .
sentences.cn: 那宗事故的官方报告称事故是由飞行员失误造成的。

phrases.cn: 试点项目，试点工程；样板工程，样板设计
n. 初步研究；预备试验；飞行员研究

sentences.en: a tennis coach
sentences.cn: 网球教练

sentences.en: the Norwegian national coach
sentences.cn: 挪威国家队教练

sentences.en: the Scandinavian countries
sentences.cn: 斯堪的纳维亚国家

sentences.en: developing countries
sentences.cn: 发展中国家

sentences.en: travelling to a foreign country
sentences.cn: 到国外旅行

sentences.en: The head teacher said pupils’, parents’ and other teachers’ opinions were sought before the uniform rules were changed.
sentences.cn: 校长说，在修改这一着装规定之前，已经征求过学生、家长和其他老师的意见。

sentences.en: Willie McEwen, acting head teacher at Westray Junior High, said: ''We're delighted that Loganair has come forward with this solution.
sentences.cn: 韦斯特雷中学代理校长威利·麦克尤恩说：“我们很高兴洛根航空公司能提出这个解决方案。”

sentences.en: In 1955, Meg took up a post as an English teacher at the French convent school and rose to become acting head teacher, despite her Protestant background.
sentences.cn: 父亲在那里的赫尔大学担任教育学院图书馆馆长。 1955年，母亲在法国修道院学校任英语教师，尽管她信奉新教，不久还是被升为代理校长。

sentences.en: Jay stripped his clothes off and ran into the sea.
sentences.cn: 杰伊脱光衣服奔入海里。

sentences.en: Most exports went by sea .
sentences.cn: 大部分出口商品都走海路。

sentences.en: a little cottage by the sea
sentences.cn: 一座海滨小屋

sentences.en: Rollings will stay as chairman this year.
sentences.cn: 罗林斯今年将继续担任主席一职。

sentences.en: Nine women gained weight, and four stayed the same .
sentences.cn: 九名女性体重增加，四名仍保持不变。

phrases.cn: 同…住在一起；把…坚持下去；与…并驾齐驱

sentences.en: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.cn: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.en: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.cn: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.en: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.cn: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

sentences.en: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.cn: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

sentences.en: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.cn: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.en: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.cn: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.en: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.cn: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

phrases.cn: 如果是这样的话；要是这样

sentences.en: a news reporter
sentences.cn: 新闻记者

sentences.en: Can I use your phone?
sentences.cn: 我可以用一下你的电话吗？

sentences.en: I’ll show you which room you can use.
sentences.cn: 我来跟你说一下你可以用哪个房间。

sentences.en: I always use the same shampoo.
sentences.cn: 我一直用同一种洗发水。

sentences.en: italic type
sentences.cn: 斜体字

sentences.en: We need to get this finished as quickly as possible.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽快完成此事。

sentences.en: Kids grow up so quickly these days.
sentences.cn: 现在的孩子长得真快啊。

sentences.en: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.cn: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

phrases.cn: n. （美）国务卿；（英）国务大臣；（美）州政府秘书长

sentences.en: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.cn: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.en: He was beginning to get angry .
sentences.cn: 他开始发脾气了。

sentences.en: His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.cn: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.en: There’s no need to be afraid.
sentences.cn: 没有必要害怕。

phrases.cn: [古语]十分严肃地，一本正经地

sentences.en: She gave me a worried look.
sentences.cn: 她担心地看了我一眼。

sentences.en: His parents must be worried sick (= extremely worried ) .
sentences.cn: 他的父母肯定担心死了。

sentences.en: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
sentences.cn: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.en: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.cn: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.en: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.cn: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.en: You're hacking these days, you should go to see a doctor.
sentences.cn: 这几天你总是干咳，你得找医生看一看啦。

sentences.en: If you notice a bad smell or think you may have an infection, see a doctor or gynecologist right away.
sentences.cn: 如果你发现了身上有难闻的气味，或者你认为自己得了传染病，马上去看医生、或者妇科医生。

sentences.en: But if your symptoms persist—or worsen dramatically—see a doctor!
sentences.cn: 但是如果你的症状一直持续——或急剧恶化——去看医生吧！

sentences.en: Susanna was wearing a black silk dress.
sentences.cn: 苏珊娜穿着一条黑色真丝连衣裙。

sentences.en: He wore glasses for reading.
sentences.cn: 他阅读时戴眼镜。

sentences.en: More and more people are surviving heart attacks.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的人在心脏病发作后存活下来。

sentences.en: He spent more time perfecting his dance moves instead of gym work.
sentences.cn: 他用更多的时间来完善他的舞蹈动作而不是健身。

sentences.en: a deep wound
sentences.cn: 很深的伤口

sentences.en: She was sitting in a deep leather chair.
sentences.cn: 她坐在一张很深的皮椅子里。

phrases.cn: —深陷其中，深深卷入(尤指麻烦)
深陷(于)，专心致力(于)，埋头(于)；沉湎于…中，全神贯注的

sentences.en: Slow down, I need to catch my breath.
sentences.cn: 慢一点，我要喘口气。

phrases.cn: 喘不过气来，上气不接下气

sentences.en: I did just have to take a deep breath and push the publish button regardless of the fear.
sentences.cn: 我实在只需要深呼吸一口，然后不管什么恐惧，点一下发布按钮就好了。

sentences.en: Get it out of your system. Then take a deep breath and consider how evolution affected a few specific body parts, and why.
sentences.cn: 把它从你的思绪中去掉然后深呼吸，现在来考虑进化是如何影响一些特殊的身体器官以及为什么。

sentences.en: Instead, take the time to go outside and really observe nature, take a deep breath of fresh air, enjoy the serenity of water and greenery.
sentences.cn: 实际上，我们应该抽出时间到户外走走，观赏自然美景，深深呼吸新鲜空气，享受泉水和草木的宁静。

sentences.en: I was amazed at the number of plants - I counted 147.
sentences.cn: 我对植物的数量之多感到惊讶，我数了有147棵。

sentences.en: Before you blow up and say something you'll regret later - count to ten.
sentences.cn: 在你自我膨胀并说出一些会后悔的话之前——先数到十吧。

sentences.en: Just count to ten and then consider whether or not you should make that purchase.
sentences.cn: 数到十然后再考虑一下你是否购买。

sentences.en: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.cn: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.en: kids chasing around the house
sentences.cn: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

phrases.cn: 开门见山；提到关键问题；转入（或切入）正题

sentences.en: Cats prey on birds and mice.
sentences.cn: 猫捕食鸟类及老鼠。

sentences.en: We disinfested the kitchen of mice.
sentences.cn: 我们杀灭了厨房的老鼠。

sentences.en: We'll have to dispose of the mice in the house .
sentences.cn: 我们得消灭屋里的老鼠。

sentences.en: The bad weather conditions prevented the plane from landing.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气使飞机无法着陆。

sentences.en: Divorce is bad for children.
sentences.cn: 离婚对孩子不好。

phrases.cn: n. 坏消息；令人讨厌的人；倒霉的事

sentences.en: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
sentences.cn: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.en: Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.cn: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.en: Bridget can’t come – she’s ill.
sentences.cn: 布里奇特不能来了，她生病了。

sentences.en: I was feeling ill that day and decided to stay at home.
sentences.cn: 我那天不太舒服，决定留在家里。

sentences.en: a hospice for the terminally ill
sentences.cn: 晚期病人的安养院

sentences.en: Is anything wrong? You haven’t said more than two words since you got here.
sentences.cn: 出什么事啦？你到这儿以后还没说超过两句话呢。

sentences.en: Dave’s got something wrong with his foot.
sentences.cn: 戴夫的一只脚出了点毛病。

sentences.en: Don’t worry, there’s nothing wrong .
sentences.cn: 别担心，没问题的。

sentences.en: What should I do? Should I trust him?
sentences.cn: 我该怎么办？我应该相信他吗？

sentences.en: You should read his new book.
sentences.cn: 你应该读一读他的新书。

sentences.en: I should stay in bed if I were you .
sentences.cn: 我要是你，就卧床休息。

phrases.cn: 我该怎么办；我应该做些什么

sentences.en: Do you still feel hungry?
sentences.cn: 你还觉得饿吗？

sentences.en: You can never tell what he’s feeling.
sentences.cn: 他的感受你永远说不准。

sentences.en: Stop exercising if you feel any pain.
sentences.cn: 要是感到疼痛就停止练习。

phrases.cn: 镇定；感觉很好；觉得身体正常

sentences.en: He had the operation yesterday, and he’s doing very well.
sentences.cn: 他昨天做了手术，恢复得很好。

sentences.en: The parliament building sits in a large square.
sentences.cn: 议会大楼位于一个大广场上。

sentences.en: He’s got a computer sitting on his desk, but he doesn’t use it.
sentences.cn: 他有一台电脑放在书桌上，但他不用。

sentences.en: My climbing boots were sitting unused in a cupboard.
sentences.cn: 我的登山靴在橱柜里，一直没有穿。

phrases.cn: 开庭审理；成为…的一员；旁听；列席

sentences.en: I walked across the grass.
sentences.cn: 我走在草地上。

sentences.en: Keep off the grass.
sentences.cn: 请勿践踏草地。

sentences.en: In the dry season, it could be attacked by another species of ant.
sentences.cn: 在干燥的季节里,它可能会遭到另一个种类的蚂蚁攻击。

sentences.en: He later learned that another entomologist in New Jersey, 260 miles away, observed a wedding flight by the same species of ant, on the same day, and at exactly the same time!
sentences.cn: 他后来知道，在260英里以外纽泽西州另一个昆虫学家也观察到同一种类蚂蚁举行飞行婚礼的时间，竟和他记录的在同一天、同一个时刻！

sentences.en: You’ve really got no need to worry about your weight.
sentences.cn: 你真的不必担心你的体重。

sentences.en: Don’t tell Mum about this – she’s got enough to worry about (= she already has a lot of problems or is very busy ) .
sentences.cn: 别把这件事告诉妈妈——她已经够操心的了。

sentences.en: Sara tried to open the window but it was stuck.
sentences.cn: 萨拉想打开窗户，但窗户卡住了。

sentences.en: They got stuck in a traffic jam.
sentences.cn: 他们遇到了交通堵塞。

phrases.cn: 被迫接受；无法摆脱；肩负

sentences.en: By the end of the game, all the kids were covered in mud.
sentences.cn: 到了比赛快结束的时候，所有的孩子都浑身是泥。

sentences.en: The path beside the river was slippery with mud.
sentences.cn: 河边的小路泥泞湿滑。

sentences.en: Many villages in Mali consist of mud huts.
sentences.cn: 马里的大多数村庄都是泥草房。

sentences.en: Mom! Davey’s pulling my hair!
sentences.cn: 妈妈! 戴维拽我的头发！

phrases.cn: 离开，撤离；拔出；渡过难关；恢复健康；折叠的大张插页；飞机进场重新飞起
摧毁，推翻；拉下来；使……下跌

sentences.en: If everyone is ready, I’ll begin.
sentences.cn: 如果大家都准备好了，我就开始。

sentences.en: Send my best wishes to everyone in the family.
sentences.cn: 请向全家人致以最美好的祝愿。

sentences.en: Of course everyone else thought it was hilarious!
sentences.cn: 当然其他所有人都觉得好笑极了！
